TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReplySessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IReplySessionChannel Implements IReplyChannel, ISessionChannel(Of IInputSession)

Docs.summary: Definiuje interfejs do skojarzenia kanał odpowiedzi z sesji

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> Interfejsu wskazuje, że <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel> implementuje <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> semantyki.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> Skojarzone z jego <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> mogą zostać pobrane za pośrednictwem <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> właściwości.
